answers.answer: I have heard that the the chinese herbal suppliment **** quai helps with pcos my sister was taking the viatex and **** quai (not at the same time) and she concieved my nephew who is now 6

I have pcos and my dr has me on metformin. I have a lot of other things wrong with me fertility wise. I'm just about 6 weeks after my 3rd ivf. Our 2nd ivf ended in mc. Pregnancy is definetly possible it just may take a little longer.Best of luck to you!

I recommend a good healthy diet, regular exercise and of course, sex! PCOS and diabetes make it difficult to conceive, but not impossible. Clomifene and FSH can help, but be sure to have your partner's fertility checked too.

question: Hello y'all I wanted to see if there's any one who could guide me in right direction to becoming pregrant. I am 28 years old never been prego, got diagnosed with pcos an diabeties type 2. Two years ago they told me I had pcos for 2 years an I never knew. I know sumone who has pcos an got prego off of clomid but does anyone know anything that would help? title: help to get preg w/ pcos
